Title: Settings
Subtitle: Configure your preferences and view system status
LanguageDesc: Change the display language of the application
PreloadImagesDesc: Load DLC images during startup (increases RAM usage but improves responsiveness)
LoadDLCImagesDesc: Display DLC cover images in the updater (may consume up to 1GB of RAM)
MainSelectionViewHeaderText: 🎮 What do you want to do?
MainSelectionViewDownloadDLCsBtnTooltip: If you already own the game and want to install DLC's
MainSelectionViewUpdateGameBtnTooltip: If you want to update your Sims 4 to the latest version
SettingsViewUnlockerStatusDescWorking: EA DLC Unlocker detected and working
SettingsViewUnlockerStatusDescInstall: Install the unlocker from the DLC install window.
MainSelectionViewUpdateWarning:
⚠️ IMPORTANT WARNING ⚠️

Updating your game is only for offline and cracked versions.

If you have the game from Steam/EA, you don't need to update your game, as your platform will update it automatically.

Do you want to continue?
RamWarningMessage:
⚠️ High RAM usage detected ({0:F0} MB)

We strongly recommend DISABLING the 'Preload Images on Startup' option in Settings to reduce memory consumption.

This will significantly improve application performance.
CheatsGuide.Title: Cheats Guide
CheatsGuide.SubtitleText: Complete list of The Sims 4 cheat codes
CheatsGuide.ExportAllButtonTooltip: Export all cheats to a .txt file on Desktop
CheatsGuide.ExportFavoritesButtonTooltip: Export only favorite cheats to a .txt file on Desktop
CheatsGuideView.EnableCheatsDescription: Enables cheats in the game. MUST be activated first before using other cheats.
CheatsGuideView.HeadlineEffectsDescripti: Enables or disables effects above Sims' heads (plumbob and thoughts).
CheatsGuideView.FPSDescription: Shows or hides the FPS counter in the top corner.
CheatsGuideView.FullscreenDescription: Toggles between windowed and fullscreen mode.
CheatsGuideView.HoverEffectsDescription: Enables or disables highlighting when hovering over objects.
CheatsGuideView.RosebudDescription: Adds §1,000 simoleons to your household (same as kaching).
CheatsGuideView.ExactMoneyDescription: Sets the exact amount of money you want. Requires testingcheats true.
CheatsGuideView.AutoPayBillsDescription: Enables or disables automatic bill payment.
CheatsGuideView.FreeRealEstateDescriptio: Makes all houses and lots free when moving in.
CheatsGuideView.FillNeedDescription: Fills a specific need of the selected Sim. Types: hunger, energy, bladder, hygiene, social, fun.
CheatsGuideView.FillAllNeedsDescription: Fills all needs of the active Sim.
CheatsGuideView.DisableNeedsDecayDescrip: Needs will not decay. Requires testingcheats true.
CheatsGuideView.SetMajorSkillDescription: Sets the level of a major skill (1-10). Skills: Baking, Bartending, Charisma, Comedy, Fishing, Fitness, Gardening, GourmetCooking, Guitar, Handiness, HomestyleCooking, Logic, Mischief, Painting, Photography, Piano, Programming, RocketScience, Singing, Violin, VideoGaming, Writing.
CheatsGuideView.SetMinorSkillDescription: Sets the level of a minor skill (1-5). Skills: Dancing, DJMixing, MediaProduction, Wellness.
CheatsGuideView.ChildSkillDescription: Sets child skills (1-10). Skills: Creativity, Mental, Motor, Social.
CheatsGuideView.ToddlerSkillDescription: Sets toddler skills (1-5). Skills: Communication, Imagination, Movement, Potty, Thinking.
CheatsGuideView.InstantPromotionDescript: Promotes the Sim in their current career. Common careers: Adult_Active_Astronaut, Adult_Active_Athlete, Adult_Criminal, Adult_Culinary, Adult_Entertainer, Adult_Painter, Adult_SecretAgent, Adult_TechGuru, Adult_Writer.
CheatsGuideView.DemoteCareerDescription: Demotes the Sim one level in their career.
CheatsGuideView.AddCareerDescription: Adds a specific career to the Sim.
CheatsGuideView.RemoveCareerDescription: Removes the career from the Sim.
CheatsGuideView.ModifyFriendshipDescript: Modifies the friendship level between two Sims (-100 to 100).
CheatsGuideView.ModifyRomanceDescription: Modifies the romance level between two Sims (-100 to 100).
CheatsGuideView.MeetEveryoneDescription: The active Sim will meet all Sims in the world.
CheatsGuideView.MoveObjectsDescription: Allows placing objects anywhere, ignoring restrictions.
CheatsGuideView.HiddenObjectsDescription: Shows hidden objects in build/buy mode.
CheatsGuideView.UnlockCareerObjectsDescr: Unlocks career reward objects in build/buy.
CheatsGuideView.FreeBuildDescription: Allows editing special lots like hospital or police station.
CheatsGuideView.FullEditModeCASDescripti: Allows full editing in CAS (Create a Sim) including changing traits and aspirations. Requires testingcheats true. Shift+Click on Sim and select 'Modify in CAS'.
CheatsGuideView.DisableDeathDescription: Enables or disables death in the game.
CheatsGuideView.MakeGhostDescription: Turns the Sim into a ghost. Types: OldAge, Drowning, Electrocution, Fire, Hunger, Anger, Embarrassment.
CheatsGuideView.RemoveGhostDescription: Removes the ghost trait from the Sim.
CheatsGuideView.CompleteCurrentMilestone: Completes the current milestone of the Sim's aspiration.
CheatsGuideView.SatisfactionPointsDescri: Adds satisfaction points to the active Sim.
CheatsGuideView.AddTraitDescription: Adds a trait to the Sim. Examples: Active, Cheerful, Creative, Genius, Romantic, etc.
CheatsGuideView.RemoveTraitDescription: Removes a trait from the Sim.
CheatsGuideView.ResetSimDescription: Resets the selected Sim (useful if stuck).
CheatsGuideView.SpawnObjectDescription: Spawns a specific object by its ID.
CheatsGuideView.AddMoodletDescription: Adds a specific moodlet. Examples: e_buff_happy, e_buff_sad, e_buff_energized, e_buff_flirty, e_buff_angry.
CheatsGuideView.RemoveAllMoodletsDescrip: Removes all moodlets from the Sim.
